name: Gan Noe Preschool
description: Preschool and summer programs with options for half day, and 2 or 3 day classes for children ages two to five years old.
fullDescription: Preschool and summer programs with options for half day, and 2 or 3 day classes for children ages two to five years old.
whatTheyOffer: Preschool and summer programs with options for half day, and 2 or 3 day classes for children ages two to five years old.
howToGetIt: Schedule a tour here and after the tour complete an application form here. You will be notified by the 2nd week in March if they are able to accommodate your preschool needs.
cost: This is a fee based service
